properties.areaDesc: Marengo, AL; Greene, AL; Hale, AL
properties.headline: Flood Warning issued February 4 at 9:54PM CST by NWS Birmingham AL
properties.description:
...The National Weather Service in Birmingham AL has issued a Flood
Warning for the following rivers in Alabama...

Black Warrior River At Selden Lock and Dam Affecting Greene...Hale
and Marengo Counties.

.Rainfall amounts of 2 to 3 inches are forecast across
portions of the Black Warrior River Basin through much of this week.
This will cause minor rises along the Black Warrior River at Selden
Lock and Dam which may produce minor overflow into the surrounding
low-lying areas.

The National Weather Service in Birmingham AL has issued a

* Flood Warning for
the Black Warrior River At Selden Lock and Dam.
* from Friday evening until further notice...or until the Warning is
cancelled.
* At  9:30 PM Tuesday The stage Was 76.3 feet.
* Flood stage is 90.0 feet.
* Minor flooding is forecast.
* Forecast...Rise above flood stage by Friday night and continue to
rise to near 92.5 feet by early Sunday morning.
* Impact...At 94.0 feet...Some secondary roads in the area begin to
flood. Flooding of farm and pasture lands continues.
properties.instruction:
Do not drive cars through flooded areas.  Turn Around...Don't Drown.

Another statement will be issued by Wednesday morning...or sooner if
conditions warrant.
